articles.author: Benjamin Brown, Zahid Mahmood, Stephanie Busari, Mostafa Salem
articles.title: Cape Verde: Authorities 'left people to die' despite warnings about migrant boat weeks before tragedy, rights group alleges - CNN
articles.description: Four national authorities and the European Union’s border patrol agency Frontex failed to make “sufficient” efforts to prevent the deaths of dozens of migrants off West Africa, despite being warned about the boat weeks before, a Spanish human rights NGO alleg…
articles.content: Four national authorities and the European Unions border patrol agency Frontex failed to make sufficient efforts to prevent the deaths of dozens of migrants off West Africa, despite being warned abou… [+1978 chars]
